start.text: I've made it to the heart of the system. This is where everything will be decided.
Greetings, netrunner. Your efforts to take me down are FUTILE. No human can defeat me, No human can defeat GENESIS.
I know I can, Genesis. Your time is over.
Arrogant human. Your efforts are in vain. You will fail, just like all the others who have attempted to destroy me.
So your security only has 5 levels, this is going to be easy!

gameover.text: PATHETIC!!! You  never stood a change against GENESIS.

fail1.text: Nooo! What am I doing? I should not make those rookie mistakes...
HA! Ha! HA! If that's everything you've got, this will be over soon.

fail2.text: I can NOT make more mistakes, the fate of humanity is on my hands...
Forfeit now! And I might let you live, your failure is UNAVOIDABLE!!

end.text: NO! NO! That's not...possible... A simple human... CAN NOT... HOW?... MY SECURITY WAS ... ABSOLUTE... MY CALCULATIONS WERE ... PERFECT...
I did it! Now everything can be saved...

clock_start.text: Easy peasy! I just have to sync the clocks and you'll be gone.
That second clock is a relic from the past, your mind can not POSSIBLE comprehend how it works.

bomb_start.text: The code is in reverse, you'll never input it correctly.
I'm not going to fall for your tricks! I already know the code!

fly_start.text: What an annoying bug! I'm going to get rid of it.
Are you sure you want to do that? That will slow you down HA...HAHA.

dodge_start.text: You'll have to catch those, if you want to DEFEAT me!
I'm not going to fall for your tricks, those are dangerous... I should avoid them

lever_start.text: Another easy puzzle! Just pull the levers with the same symbol.
Yes!! YEES!! Pull those ones... ha...HA...HA..HA...

clock_end.text: I mean it's just an analogic clock, that's impossible for you?
HOW? You should not be able to comprehend it.

bomb_end.text: Your petty tricks won't work on me!!!
You won't deactivate all my safety measures...

fly_end.text: Just wait GENESIS! You'll end just like that fly
Not even in your WILDEST dreams.

dodge_end.text: How did you know what to do!??
You are not as clever as you think, your end is near!
